parse.title: List of Windows Games on Demand

text.*:
This is list of the Windows Games on Demand (225) released Games on Demand for the Microsoft Windows platform, available on the now closed Games for Windows Marketplace.[1]

Contents

  • 1 Released
  • 2 See also
  • 3 Notes
  • 4 References
  • 5 External links

Notes[edit]

  1. ^ These titles are not available to accounts outside of Great Britain.
  2. ^ These titles are not available to accounts outside of Europe.
  3. ^ a b Requires the base game Europa Universalis III Complete in order to play
  4. ^ a b Requires the base game King Arthur: The Role-playing Wargame in order to play
  5. ^ Requires the base game Patrician IV in order to play
  6. ^ a b c d Requires the base game The Sims 3 in order to play.
  7. ^ Requires the base game The Sims Medieval in order to play
  8. ^ Requires the base game Trainz Simulator 2010: Engineers Edition in order to play.
